amendatorysection.catchline: Title IV-D child support order; review of health care coverage provisions.
amendatorysection.para: The county attorney or authorized attorney shall review the health care coverage provisions contained in any child support order which is subject to review under section 43-512.12 and shall include in any application for modification a request that the court order health care coverage or cash medical support as provided in subsection (2) of section 42-369.
